name: RE77 v.09 (Reupload)
description:
The latest (and so far only) build of the once in development PT styled horror game RE77. This is the only version of the game that I could find after a very long search, and as the developer has gone dark for multiple years it is safe to say this game will not be updated.

The game is severely unfinished, and after playing a good hour or two of it, I have no idea whether or not there is a definite end to it.

Please keep in mind: this is only a re-upload to preserve the game for historic reasons. If I am contacted by the original developer (MrDewitt77) or told to take this down, the page will be taken down permanently.
